channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: How to watch England vs Ireland: Free Streams, TV Info as Steve Borthwick's side look to hit back at Twickenham
item.description: All the ways to watch England vs Ireland live streams online – including for FREE – in the 2026 Six Nations Round 3 clash at Twickenham.

item.title: « Bordel, la Chine est en train de gagner » : cette journaliste essaye la Xiaomi SU7 électrique et ne veut plus conduire sa Ford Mustang
item.description: Après avoir passé deux semaines au volant de la Xiaomi SU7 électrique, une journaliste américaine du Wall Street Journal tire un constat sans appel : l'industrie automobile occidentale accuse un retard technologique flagrant face aux constructeurs chinois.

item.title: ‘Narco-Submarine’ Carrying 4 Tons of Cocaine Captured by Mexico's Navy
item.description: Following increased surveillance and patrols of routes used by transnational drug-trafficking networks, Mexican authorities have seized approximately 10 tons of cocaine in the past week alone.

item.title: Landman season 3 — everything we know so far about the hit Taylor Sheridan show's return
item.description: Halfway through season 2, we got the green light from Paramount for a third season of Tommy Norris and co. But how much do we actually know about Landman season 3?

item.title: There's a simple way to watch the Super 8 at the T20 World Cup for *FREE*
item.description: Here's how you can watch the Super Eights at the T20 World Cup for free from anywhere in the world.

item.title: My first love, The Legend of Zelda, turns 40 today — here's why I think the series has survived and thrived
item.description: The Legend of Zelda has stood the tests of time (quite literally, in-game), but there's a lot more to its success than might meet the eye...

item.title: Why using facial recognition on your phone could leave you vulnerable
item.description: Journalists and activists aren’t the only ones who can have their biometrics used against them. Here’s how to protect yourself. Biometric authentication—the ability to unlock your devices by using just your face or fingerprint—is one of the few smartphone features that, even today, leave me feeling like we’re living in the future. When I was a kid, technology like facial recognition was limited to science fiction. But as cool and useful as biometric authentication is, the technology can also leave us vulnerable. Here’s why—and how to protect yourself....

item.title: This Olympic skill can boost your job performance
item.description: Elite athletes aren’t just exceptional at sports—they’re exceptional at managing their attention. Here’s how you can do the same. Olympians aren’t just physically exceptional—they’re masters at managing where their attention and energy go.

item.title: On a testé l’Acemagic RX16 : les PC portables chinois pas chers sont-ils fréquentables ?
item.description: Vous les avez vus inonder le marché des mini PC avec des rapports performance / prix indécents ? Les constructeurs chinois s'attaquent désormais aux PC portables comme cet Acemagic RX16. On a pu le tester.

item.title: Apple, Google, Microsoft : pourquoi la Silicon Valley se met à genoux devant Donald Trump ?
item.description: Comment les patrons des géants de la Tech US sont-ils tombés amoureux de Donald Trump ? Est-ce un amour intéressé ou une véritable adhésion ? On vous explique ça en vidéo.

item.title: ‘A confident answer isn’t the same as a correct one’ — I asked medical experts whether you should use ChatGPT for health advice, and I was shocked by their answers
item.description: From symptom checking to appointment prep, experts explain where AI can help and where it can mislead.

item.title: Will 2026 be the year facial recognition becomes boring, and why does it matter?
item.description: Why 2026 is set to be a pivotal year for facial recognition technology, as it shifts from novelty to necessity.

item.title: How to switch your music from Spotify to Qobuz with minimal fuss and without losing your playlists
item.description: If you want to ditch Spotify, here's how to transfer your music from the streaming service over to Qobuz with minimal fuss (including to your playlists)

item.title: The government’s free speech doctrine allows Trump to name things after himself
item.description: In some cases, though, the administration may be bound by statute or formal contracts, as with the legal battle over the Kennedy Center, which was named by an act of Congress. In November 2025, the Trump administration announced a special park pass commemorating the nation’s 250th anniversary that featured images of two presidents: George Washington and Donald Trump....

item.title: Meilleurs TV Hisense : quel modèle choisir en 2026 ?
item.description: Hisense fait partie du paysage TV en 2026, tout particulièrement sur des produits à coût avantageux face aux mastodontes LG et Samsung. On fait le point ici sur les modèles les plus intéressants à choisir dans le catalogue de la marque.

item.title: Amazfit Active Max : cette montre connectée de sport abordable et endurante, notée 9/10, vient de sortir, mais elle est déjà en promo
item.description: Autonomie bluffante, écran Amoled bien lisible, bon suivi GPS... L'Amazfit Active Max peut tout à fait accompagner les sportifs au quotidien. En plus, cette excellente montre connectée est encore plus abordable que d'habitude : lancée à 169,90 euros, elle est désormais proposée à 159,99 euros par Alltricks.

item.title: JO Milan-Cortina 2026 : les drones agacent certains spectateurs mais bouleversent l’image TV
item.description: Aux JO de Milan-Cortina 2026, les drones FPV propulsent la diffusion TV dans une nouvelle dimension. Si leur bourdonnement fait réagir, les sportifs valident à 100 %.
